p: According to Table 3, there was a decrease in the moisture of the films with microparticles in comparison to the control film and those with the addition of oil. Song et al. [ 19] observed a similar behavior for corn starch-based films incorporated with lemon essential oil. Dashipour et al. [ 68] reported that the moisture content of the carboxymethylcellulose-based film decreased significantly when Zataria multiflora essential oil was incorporated and attributed this to the reduction of the films hydrophilic nature.
